<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n6kpqgIj4W1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/S0N78y"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f642676d1224fc1f1bfcbb787f011878/tumblr_inline_n6kvr97k4G1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><strong>SpiritOffice</strong>'s <strong>Science Library</strong> lets you take the guesswork out of science. Use the monitor and library functions to see if new science can be attained, view the science you have and check how much other science you’ll need to complete your objectives. It’s simple and effective.</p>

<p>Find out more about <strong>Science Library <a href="http://bit.ly/S0N78y">HERE</a></strong>.</p>
Aw that's very helpful! No more spreadsheet for me.

...that's stock, SQUAD

Yeah. Sort of, this tells you how much SCIENCE! Is remaining. I've seen this before, and this is one of the less-needed showcase. When I read "science" I thought "Station science"
I found one flaw in your design. This mod includes listing for impossible statuses.. like "surface, splashed ksc runway" for atmospheric scans.
Wow, please optimize and give it to us stock sometime?
